alert.note: Alert for Animas River Basin; Southwest San Juan Mountains (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 23 at 6:38PM MDT by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern La Plata County through 715 PM MDT... At 638 PM MDT, meteorologists and satellite imagery were tracking a strong thunderstorm near Durango, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Satellite imagery. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Bayfield. This includes the following highways... U.S. Highway 550 in Colorado between mile markers 14 and 16. U.S. Highway 160 in Colorado between mile markers 87 and 103. Colorado 172 between mile markers 11 and 24. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Animas River Basin; Southwest San Juan Mountains
